Package com.jimmyselectronics.opeechee

Interface CardReaderListener

All Superinterfaces:
AbstractDeviceListener
public interface CardReaderListener extends AbstractDeviceListener
Listens for events emanating from a coin dispenser.
Author:
Jimmy's Electronics LLP

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cardDataRead(CardReader reader, Card.CardData data)
    Announces that the data has been read from a card.
    void
    cardInserted(CardReader reader)
    Announces that a card has been inserted in the indicated card reader.
    void
    cardRemoved(CardReader reader)
    Announces that a card has been removed from the indicated card reader.
    void
    cardSwiped(CardReader reader)
    Announces that a card has swiped on the indicated card reader.
    void
    cardTapped(CardReader reader)
    Announces that a (tap-enabled) card has been tapped on the indicated card reader.

    Methods inherited from interface com.jimmyselectronics.AbstractDeviceListener

    disabled, enabled, turnedOff, turnedOn

  • Method Details

    • cardInserted

      void cardInserted(CardReader reader)
      Announces that a card has been inserted in the indicated card reader.
      Parameters:
      reader - The reader where the event occurred.

    • cardRemoved

      void cardRemoved(CardReader reader)
      Announces that a card has been removed from the indicated card reader.
      Parameters:
      reader - The reader where the event occurred.

    • cardTapped

      void cardTapped(CardReader reader)
      Announces that a (tap-enabled) card has been tapped on the indicated card reader.
      Parameters:
      reader - The reader where the event occurred.

    • cardSwiped

      void cardSwiped(CardReader reader)
      Announces that a card has swiped on the indicated card reader.
      Parameters:
      reader - The reader where the event occurred.

    • cardDataRead

      void cardDataRead(CardReader reader, Card.CardData data)
      Announces that the data has been read from a card.
      Parameters:
      reader - The reader where the event occurred.
      data - The data that was read. Note that this data may be corrupted.
